description: The IDocument interface is the basic interface for objects that can be tags in an MXML document and need to know about the host document.  It is similar to the IMXMLObject interface in the Flex SDK.

members.description: This method is called to notify an instance of what MXML document it belongs to, if any, and what its assigned id is in that document, if any.

values: document The MXML document that hosts this component.
id The optional id of the component in the document.
